mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu (menuno, name, explanation, price, photo, recom, storeno) VALUES (MENU_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{explanation}, #{price}, #{photo}, 0, #{storeno})
mapper.select: SELECT menuno, name, explanation, price, photo, recom, storeno FROM menu ORDER BY menuno ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE menu SET name = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, explanation = #{explanation, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price, jdbcType=INTEGER}, photo = #{photo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recom = #{recom, jdbcType=INTEGER}, storeno = #{storeno, jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE menuno = #{menuno, jdbcType=INTEGER}
